Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartsheet.api.models.IdentifiableModel<Long>

  • public class Comment
extends IdentifiableModel<Long>
    Represents the Comment object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Comment.AddCommentBuilder
      A convenience class to generate a comment with the appropriate fields for adding it to a sheet.
